sentences.en: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.

sentences.en: Give an introduction, followed by the body of the material, then a brief summary.
sentences.cn: 首先写序言，接下来是内容的主体部分，然后作简短的总结。

sentences.en: He gave a summary account.
sentences.cn: 他给出了简要的说明.

sentences.en: He made a summary of what had been done.
sentences.cn: 他总结了所做的事情.

sentences.en: He was given the summary punishment.
sentences.cn: 他当场就受到了处罚.

sentences.en: I'm giving you a summary of facts.
sentences.cn: 我将概述一下事实.

sentences.en: In summary, it is my opinion that this complete treatment process was very successful.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，我认为整个治疗过程非常成功。

sentences.en: in summary, there is no clear case for one tax system compared to another.
sentences.cn: 简要地说，并没有明确理据说一种税制优于另一种税制。

sentences.en: It can be useful to write a short summary of your argument first.
sentences.cn: 先把你的论点纲要写下来可能会有帮助。

sentences.en: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentences.cn: 据说酷刑和草草处决很常见。

sentences.en: She complained about the summary treatment given her.
sentences.cn: 她抱怨对她草率的对待.

sentences.en: The Court generally upheld the FDA's summary judgment practice.
sentences.cn: 最高法院普遍确认了食品和药物管理局的即决审判作法.

sentences.en: The following is a summary of our conclusions.
sentences.cn: 现将我们的几点结论综述如下。

sentences.en: The last paragraph is a succinct summary.
sentences.cn: 最后这段话概括性很强.

sentences.en: The seven o'clock news and market summary were on the radio.
sentences.cn: 收音机里播放着七点钟新闻和市场简讯.

sentences.en: There is a summary at the end of each chapter.
sentences.cn: 每一章节后均附有小结.

sentences.en: There is no doubt that some considered that a beating was no more than summary justice.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，有人认为拷打比草菅人命好不到哪去。

sentences.en: This matter cannot be settled in a summary fashion.
sentences.cn: 不能用简单的方法去解决这个问题.
